sentences.sContent: I turned to speak to the person standing behind me.
sentences.sCn: 我转身和站在我后面的那人说话。

sentences.sContent: Someone could easily creep up behind us.
sentences.sCn: 很可能有人跟在我们后面。

sentences.sContent: The car behind was hooting impatiently.
sentences.sCn: 后面那辆车不耐烦地按着喇叭。

sentences.sContent: Jane shut the door behind her.
The manager was sitting behind a large desk.
sentences.sCn: 经理坐在一张大办公桌的后面。

sentences.sContent: ...I've got a feeling that trade union representative is behind this...
...where children shout slogans in order to learn self-control or must stand behind their desk when they can't sit still...
...All the traditional reasons put forward to interpret the pay gap--that women fall behind when they leave the workforce to raise kids...
...There are some reasons behind this attitude...
...The hidden reason behind this is not hard to analyze as there’s a growing awareness for the authorities regarding the urgency of popularization of culture...
...Is that the round building behind the parking lot...
...What is the idea behind the Community Policing Program...

...The idea behind the program is to get the police officers out of their cars and into our neighborhoods where they can talk directly to merchants and residents about the real dynamics of our city...

trans.tranOther: at or towards the back of a thing or person
